metadata.title: CVE-2024-54193 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:accel/ivpu: Fix WARN in ivpu_ipc_send_receive_internal()Move pm_runtime_set_active() to ivpu_pm_init() so whenivpu_ipc_send_receive_internal() is executed before ivpu_pm_enable()it already has correct runtime state, even if last resume wasnot successful.
